title: 82/65/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 December 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Becton Dickinson-fluorescence-activated cell sorter, FACS IV' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 21 December 1981
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Becton Dickinson - fluorescence-activated cell sorter, FACS IV' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/65/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Becton Dickinson - fluorescence-activated cell sorter, FACS IV', which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 15 June 1981, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 December 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
